A form that allows to send weekly update: A form that allows to send weekly updates on the current status of the rice growth
A unique code for the field, for example: A unique code for the field, for example
After you have logged in: After you have logged in, there are three ways to find your farm field:
By tapping on the big arrow: By tapping on the big arrow in the middle of the welcome screen, you can zoom directly to your current location. A map view opens that shows your current location, and any nearby fields. Tapping on a specific field opens the detailed information of that field.
By tapping, a tab can be opened or close: By tapping, a tab can be opened or closed to display or hide the extra information details.
Click here to explore the map: Click here to explore the map
Date of the last known sowing: Date of the last known sowing
Farmer is part of the cooperation: Farmer is part of the cooperation
Fill in one-time information at the star: Fill in one-time information at the start of the season
Flood level indicates the current water: Flood level indicates the current water level in the Mekong River
For any issues regarding: For any issues regarding this application, please refer to the contact section below
For any questions regarding the app: For any questions regarding the app, registration or data collection, please contact one of the contacts below.
Geolocation is not supported by your dev: Geolocation is not supported by your device
HTX means farmer is part of the cooperat: HTX means farmer is part of the cooperation
In the setting menu, you can switch: In the settings menu, you can switch between the background layer. The options street view, satellite, and natural are available.
In the welcome screen: In the welcome screen, you can tap on ‘Explore location by map’ to manually navigate to the desired location. The default map displays all included farms.
Indicates if Blast has been observed rec: Indicates if Blast has been observed recently in that field
Indicates if the Brown plant hopper has: Indicates if the Brown plant hopper has been observed recently in that field
Indicates if the Leaffolder has been obs: Indicates if the Leaffolder has been observed recently in that field
Indicates the last known growth stage: Indicates the last known growth stage. There are eight different growth stages: Bare soil, Seedling ,Tillering, Booting, Flowering, Milking, Ripening, Harvesting.
Name of the Farmer Friend/ 3C Force work: Name of the Farmer Friend/ 3C Force worker that visits the field
Name of the farmer that is responsible f: Name of the farmer that is responsible for the rice field
No legend to show for this layer: No legend to show for this layer
Number of days after the last known sowi: Number of days after the last known sowing date
Once you have selected one of the farm f: Once you have selected one of the farm fields, the detailed information pane is opened. On top is shows the name of the farmer and the code of the field at Loc Troi Group. The app contains information in four tabs
Rice variety that is cultivated in the c: Rice variety that is cultivated in the current season
Rice variety that was cultivated the pre: Rice variety that was cultivated the previous season
Special situation that is noted during t: Special situation that is noted during the visit of the Farmer Friend
Tap to see the field nearby: Tap to see the field nearby
Tapping the arrow on top of the screen: Tapping the arrow on top of the screen returns you to the previous screen. Tapping on the map returns you to the map view.
Tapping the button in the bottom-right: Tapping the button in the bottom-right of the screen opens the legend for that map. The legend header can be tapped to switch to other maps, like growth stage and pest risk. Tapping on a specific field opens the detailed information of that field.
The application may not work as expected: The application may not work as expected
The average dry rice yield (ton/ha) of: The average dry rice yield (ton/ha) of
The blast risk is calculated based on an: The blast risk is calculated based on an algorithm, including disease observations and risk factors such as growth stage
The brown plant hopper risk is calculate: The brown plant hopper risk is calculated based on an algorithm, including pest observations and risk factors such as growth stage
The estimated date on which the rice can: The estimated date on which the rice can be harvested, based on calculations by the app.
The field size in hectares, automaticall: The field size in hectares, automatically calculated by app
The following items are available for: The following items are available for the farm fields. Please notice, that some details are only available for farmers connected to Loc Troi Group.
The harvest date of the previous season: The harvest date of the previous season.
The last known condition of the crop: The last known condition of the rice field. If the condition is not indicated as good, the cause is indicated (drought damage, pest and disease damage, flood damage, salinity damage, or damage because of soil acidity
The last known height of the plant: The last known height of the plant, based on field measurements or data analysis.
The last time the Farmer Friend visited: The last time the Farmer Friend visited the field
The leaffolder risk is calculated based: The leaffolder risk is calculated based on an algorithm, including pest observations and risk factors such as growth stage
The number of rice stems per hectare of: The number of rice stems per hectare of the last season
The number of rice stems per square mete: The number of rice stems per square meter, important for estimating potential yield and pest risks
The pest risk is calculated based on an: The pest risk is calculated based on an algorithm, included pest and disease  observations and risk factors such as growth stage
The price of the paddy in VND per ton: The price of the paddy in VND per ton
The risk on pest presence is unknown: The risk on pest presence is unknown
The search bar is positioned: The search results are presented in a list, with a maximum of ten results. Farmers connected to Loc Troi Group are marked with a green dot, other farmers are marked with a grey dot. Selecting a card opens the detailed information of that field.
The search results are presented in a li: The search results are presented in a list, with a maximum of ten results. Farmers connected to Loc Troi Group are marked with a green dot, other farmers are marked with a grey dot. Selecting a card opens the detailed information of that field.
The sowing date of the previous season: The sowing date of the previous season
The three ways of finding: The three ways of finding a field are described in the following sections
There is increased risk on one or more p: There is increased risk on one or more pests
There is little risk on pest presence: There is little risk on pest presence
There was an error initializing the appl: There was an error initializing the application
There was an error while fetching the pa: There was an error while fetching the parcel details
There was an error while retrieving your: There was an error while retrieving your location

This app is part of the Sat4Rice project: This app is part of the Sat4Rice project, supported by the Geodate for Agriculture and Water (G4AW) program of the Netherland Space Office (NSO) and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands. The partnership consists of VinaNed, Loc Troi Group, Can Tho University, DARD An Giang and Soc Trang, Nelen & Schuurmans and Sarvision.
This app is provided: This app is provided by Loc Troi Group to support rice farmers and Farmer Friends in the Mekong Delta. The application contains more than 30 characteristics for each connected farm field. It includes field size, growth status, pest risk and many others. Users can also submit field observations and share this with other users. This way, the app makes sustainable rice production more efficient and easier.
This presents the current flood risk lev: This presents the current flood risk level of the Mekong River
Through the data collection tab: Through the data collection tab, you can directly start with collecting data. Two forms are available
To view private data, please use your cr: To view private data, please use your credentials to log in

When the GPS of your device it active: When the GPS of your device it active, any search result is automatically based on your current location. Location-based search can be switch of by tapping the arrow icon next to the search bar.
When you first open the app: When you first open the app, you’ll start at the welcome screen. Please be aware that you need to login to view any content
